00075 bool MembersLoader::LoadUsers(bool debugMode, const char * inputFileName, vector<MemberType> & allUsers)
00076 {
00077 
00078         std::fstream file(inputFileName, ios::in);
00079 
00080         if(!file.is_open())
00081         {
00082                 std::cout << "File not found!\n";
00083                 return 0;
00084         }
00085 
00086         // vector of vectors of strings
00087         typedef std::vector< std::vector<std::string> > csvVector;
00088 
00089         csvVector csvData; // VVS
00090 
00091         // Populate the VVS
00092         ReadCsv reader;
00093         reader.Read(file, csvData);
00094         file.close();
00095 
00096 
00097 
00098         //    Now read through the VVS and extract data
00099         //    into the MemberType objects we are making.
00100 
00101         cout << fixed << showpoint;
00102         cout << setprecision(2);
00103 
00104         string stringValue;
00105 
00106         unsigned columnCounter = 0;
00107 
00108         string firstName;
00109         string lastName;
00110         long userId;
00111         string authorisationLevel;
00112 
00113         unsigned FIRSTNAME_POS = 0;
00114         unsigned LAST_NAME_POS = 1;
00115         unsigned USER_ID_POS   = 2;
00116         unsigned AUTHORITY_POS = 3;
00117 
00118 
00119         // For each row of data
00120         for(csvVector::iterator csvRow = csvData.begin(); csvRow != csvData.end(); ++csvRow)
00121         {
00122                 columnCounter   = 0;
00123 
00124 
00125                 // For each column of data
00126                 for
00127                 (
00128                         std::vector<std::string>::iterator csvColumn = csvRow->begin();
00129 
00130                         csvColumn != csvRow->end();
00131 
00132                         ++csvColumn
00133                 )
00134                 {
00135 
00136                         //    There are 4 columns of data per row.
00137 
00138                         if(columnCounter == FIRSTNAME_POS)
00139                         {
00140                                 // First name
00141                                 firstName = * csvColumn;
00142                                 DataManip::removeLeadingWhiteSpace(firstName);
00143                                 DataManip::removeTrailingWhiteSpace(firstName);
00144 
00145                         }
00146                         if(columnCounter == LAST_NAME_POS)
00147                         {
00148                                 // Last name
00149                                 lastName = * csvColumn;
00150                                 DataManip::removeLeadingWhiteSpace(lastName);
00151                                 DataManip::removeTrailingWhiteSpace(lastName);
00152 
00153                         }
00154                         else if(columnCounter == USER_ID_POS)
00155                         {
00156                                 // Member ID
00157                                 std::istringstream istr(*csvColumn);
00158                                 istr >> userId;
00159 
00160                         }
00161                         if(columnCounter == AUTHORITY_POS)
00162                         {
00163                                 // Staff / Patron
00164                                 authorisationLevel = * csvColumn;
00165                                 DataManip::removeLeadingWhiteSpace(authorisationLevel);
00166                                 DataManip::removeTrailingWhiteSpace(authorisationLevel);
00167 
00168                         }
00169                         columnCounter++;
00170                 }
00171 
00172 
00173                 // Add the member
00174                 MemberType m;
00175                 m.setFirstName(firstName);
00176                 m.setLastName(lastName);
00177                 m.setUserId(userId);
00178                 m.setAuthority(authorisationLevel);
00179                 allUsers.push_back(m);
00180 
00181 
00182                 if (debugMode)
00183                 {
00184                         // Show user data
00185 
00186                         cout << " First Name:          " << firstName          << endl;
00187                         cout << " Last Name:           " << lastName           << endl;
00188                         cout << " User Id:             " << userId             << endl;
00189                         cout << " Authorisation Level: " << authorisationLevel << endl;
00190 
00191                         cout << endl;
00192                         cout << endl;
00193                         cout << endl;
00194                 }
00195 
00196         }
00197         return 1; // success
00198 }

00221 bool MembersLoader::SaveUsers(bool debugMode, const char * outputFileName, vector<MemberType> & membs)
00222 {
00223 
00224         std::fstream file(outputFileName, ios::out);
00225 
00226         if(!file.is_open())
00227         {
00228                 std::cout << "File not found!\n";
00229                 return 0;
00230         }
00231 
00232 
00233         // Write the data from all the MemberType objects in the vector to the text file, using CSV format.
00234         // One member per row.
00235 
00236         vector<MemberType>::iterator currentMemb;
00237 
00238         for(
00239                 currentMemb  = membs.begin();
00240 
00241                 currentMemb != membs.end();
00242 
00243                 currentMemb++)
00244         {
00245 
00246                 // Local variables
00247 
00248                 string   fname;
00249                 string   lname;
00250                 long     uid;
00251                 string   authority;
00252 
00253                 MemberType m;
00254 
00255                 m = *currentMemb; // Get the next member to write with
00256 
00257 
00258                 // Write this record.
00259 
00260                 m.getFirstName(fname);
00261                 m.getLastName(lname);
00262                 m.getUserId(uid);
00263                 m.getAuthority(authority);
00264 
00265                 file << fname           << ", ";
00266                 file << lname           << ", ";
00267                 file << uid                     << ", ";
00268                 file << authority       << ", ";
00269                 file << endl;
00270 
00271 
00272                 if (debugMode)
00273                 {
00274                         cout <<  fname                  << ", ";
00275                         cout <<  lname                  << ", ";
00276                         cout <<  uid                    << ", ";
00277                         cout <<  authority              << ", ";
00278 
00279                         cout << endl;
00280                         cout << endl;
00281                 }
00282         }
00283 
00284         file.close();
00285 
00286         return true;
00287 }
